title: Michigan Star RB Blake Corum joins J&J
description:
We are joined by star Michigan running back and Heisman candidate Shake n Blake Corum! (Okay, it's only Jalen who calls him that... but it's gonna catch on!) He talks to us about Michigan's huge matchup this weekend vs the #10 Nittany Lions, the legendary running backs HE studies, and what it's like when he's 1-on-1 with somebody, and knows he's about to break their ankles. HAIL. Plus, we go deep on Draymond's return, Harden not feeling appreciated for "taking" a team-friendly deal, and we talk Jacoby's new beard. Pull up!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
